reviews.text: Pretty good hotel. brand new near the airport! rooms have a good size and all have a nice flat 42 inch tv. bathroom could be a little nicer but nothing to complain about!
reviews.title: Nice new hotel!

reviews.text: breakfast is pretty good, good service! you have the mall right next to you and can connect without walking in the street!
reviews.title: Brand new - good deal

reviews.text: overall a decent place to stay for a couple of nights. the pool is not great at all! the gym is pretty good though!
reviews.title: Very nice brand-new hotel

reviews.text: for the price its a great value!! very clean hotel which is the important thing!
reviews.title: it was such a pleasure to stay here
